description.@en: You call for your WAAAR! Horde to fall in line and take commands. The voice of the Slavering Maw fills their ears, as they immediately scramble.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, a number of allies equal to your [WB] immediately take their Turn. This does not displace anyoneâ€™s place on the Initiative Ladder, but simply allows your allies to act first on this Turn. On subsequent Turns, the Initiative order returns to normal. In addition, they may add +3 to their Damage Threshold until the end of their second Turn. Finally, pick one ally. That ally may Run for 0 AP on their Turn now.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but add one Fortune Point to the Fortune Pool.

criticalFailure.@en: The line of defense immediately falls apart, as all allies who were benefit from this Magick must spend their next Turn using Movement Actions only. You immediately scramble backwards 6 yards and drop the pigskin.

reagents.@en: A bloated pigskin filled with Wytchstone Essence, thrown (expended)
